item.description: Best practices for all application types Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 377 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Why is this here?: At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: Best practices and use cases Best security practices for the app specific guidelines for each app Internal Workshop: When asked “What prevents devs from being successful on the OIN, respondents answered:
